import navigation from'../_nav';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AppSidebar=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const unfoldable=useSelector(state=>state.sidebarUnfoldable);const sidebarShow=useSelector(state=>state.sidebarShow);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CSidebar,{className:"border-end",colorScheme:"dark",position:"fixed",unfoldable:unfoldable,visible:sidebarShow,onVisibleChange:visible=>{dispatch({type:'set',sidebarShow:visible});},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CSidebarHeader,{className:"border-bottom",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CSidebarBrand,{to:"/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CIcon,{customClassName:"sidebar-brand-full",icon:logo,height:32}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CIcon,{customClassName:"sidebar-brand-narrow",icon:sygnet,height:32})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CCloseButton,{className:"d-lg-none",dark:true,onClick:()=>dispatch({type:'set',sidebarShow:false})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppSidebarNav,{items:navigation}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CSidebarFooter,{className:"border-top d-none d-lg-flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CSidebarToggler,{onClick:()=>dispatch({type:'set',sidebarUnfoldable:!unfoldable})})})]});};export default/*#__PURE__*/React.memo(AppSidebar);
